title-group.article-title: Un dialogue de sourds? Some Implications of the Austin-Sear le-Derrida debate

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright © 1985 The Modern Critical Theory Group

also Michael Rosen, Hegel's dialectic and its criticism, ch. 1 (Cambridge, 1982).
